tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_aid_modality AS SELECT afp.id AS pledge_id, v.name, COALESCE(v.amp_modality_id, -999999999) AS amp_modality_id FROM amp_funding_pledges afp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.pledge_id, val.category_value AS name, f.aid_modality AS amp_modality_id FROM amp_funding_pledges_details f, amp_category_value val WHERE (f.aid_modality = val.id) ) v ON afp.id = v.pledge_id;
